title: Guidance: Air Safety Information Management System (ASIMS) user manual
summary: This user manual is intended to be an easy to use reference for ASIMS users, and should be read in conjunction with Regulatory Article 1410.

title: Regulation: Notice of proposed amendments (NPA) documents
summary: MAA issuing of an NPA allows a consultation period to be undertaken on a proposed amendment or the implementation of new regulation.

title: Regulation: Notice of proposed amendments (NPA) reference table
summary: The Military Aviation Authority (MAA) NPA table provides information of proposed changes in regulations and release date.

title: News story: Operational Honours and Awards List October 2023
summary: The latest Operational Honours and Awards List recognises the bravery, commitment and commendable service of Armed Forces personnel.

title: Press release: Defence Secretary travels to Middle East on regional security mission
summary: Defence Secretary Grant Shapps travelled to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates to drive forward work to maintain regional stability.

title: News story: Graves of two Glasgow soldiers rediscovered in Belgium
summary: The graves of two World War One soldiers, Private (Pte) Peter Keill, aged 20, of 7th Battalion The Seaforth Highlanders and Second Lieutenant (2nd Lt) James Ferris, aged 29, of 16th Battalion The Highland Light Infantry, have finally been marked more than a century after their deaths.

title: Guidance: DAO qualification handbooks: level 4
summary: Qualifications, learning outcomes and assessment criteria for Defence Awarding Organisation courses.

title: News story: Graves of Two Glasgow Soldiers Identified In Belgium
summary: The graves of two World War One soldiers, Private (Pte) Peter Keill, aged 20, of 7th Battalion The Seaforth Highlanders and Second Lieutenant (2ndLt) James Ferris, aged 29, of 16th Battalion The Highland Light Infantry, have finally been marked more than a century after their deaths.

title: Guidance: Dartmoor firing times
summary: Information on Dartmoor Training Area's firing times.

title: Transparency data: MOD: workforce management information January to May 2023
summary: Reports on departmental staff numbers and costs.

title: Guidance: Country names
summary: Spellings of country names as recommended by the Permanent Committee on Geographical Names (PCGN).

title: Transparency data: Military court centres court listings
summary: Court listings for the Military court centres.

title: Regulation: Withdrawn MAA regulatory notices (RN)
summary: RNs will be issued by the MAA to notify the RC of changes in MAA owned process, or provide operational or engineering guidance.

summary: RNs will be issued by the MAA to notify the RC of changes in MAA owned process, or provide operational or engineering guidance.

title: Guidance: Salisbury Plain Training Area (SPTA) newsletter
summary: Salisbury Plain updates on training activities and access.

title: News story: Three Great War soldiers buried with full military honours in Belgium
summary: More than a century after his death, Lance Serjeant Robert Brand, a 24-year-old Glaswegian soldier has finally been laid to rest with full military honours in Belgium. He was buried alongside two unknown soldiers from the same regiment.

title: Guidance: Military low flying: MOD sponsored air exercises
summary: MOD sponsored low flying exercises within the UK low flying system.

title: Guidance: Service Prosecuting Authority
summary: The Service Prosecuting Authority is the principal prosecuting authority within the Service Justice System and is responsible for the prosecution of all service offences before the Service Courts.

title: Consultation outcome: Joint Prosecution Protocol Consultation
summary: A Service Prosecuting Authority (SPA), Crown Prosecution Service (CPS) and Public Prosecuting Service Northern Ireland (PPSNI) public consultation on joint prosecution protocol.

title: Guidance: Joint Prosecution Protocol
summary: Protocol regarding the exercise of criminal jurisdiction in England and Wales.
